name: Royal Dungeon
description:
LIMITED TIME OFFER 1.99$

The king and his queen are trapped in their castle which suddenly turned out as a very dangerous place. The goal is to escape those two from the deadly castle, helping them to avoid a variety of enemies and traps.

Unique features:
Unique control - both king and queen move simultaniously but the queen's controls are mirrored.
Great medeival graphics
Lots of enemies and weapons to destroy them
